storyInfo: Amiya decides to leave Rosmontis and go to face Talulah alone. She orders Rosmontis to live on, and help others live on.

attributes.content: *Pant* *pant*...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's medical technology is streets ahead of ours... I'll give you that...
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Part of our plan is to send medical personnel to all the Infected settlements, but it's way too dangerous to send our normal medical operators into warzones.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm good... Thanks. I'm much better now that I've been bandaged.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: The enemies have retreated. The battlefield has grown in size. I can't use my Arts anymore. I can't track them down.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You can count on the devils on the team to get that done for you. They're very good at that.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Thank you, Rhodes Island soldiers. Without your bravery, the number of casualties would have been much higher.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I also heard you saying just now, Cautus, you're trying to make it to the control tower by yourself?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: ...Uh, yeah, but also probably not.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What does that even mean?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I will probably be the only one there when I face Talulah.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A warrior from Lungmen might also be there... but I am just going to assume there won't be anyone else right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How do you plan on killing her all by yourself? You are nothing like the captain.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Sure, but neither is anyone else here. The more people we have there, the bigger of a mess things are going to be if a fight does break out. Besides, Talulah is much better than Patriot at quickly bringing the battlefield under control with her Arts.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll bring a squad inside with me. There are bound to be other threats in the control tower.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you sure you're bringing enough?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: I trust the people on my team. Each and every one of them can be counted on, and they know how to adjust to all kinds of situations. If we end up somewhere we can't handle ourselves, we will ask for your help.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you trying to keep us out of the final showdown?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: No, It's not that I'm trying to take charge of the battle. It's just that, sir, there are other battles that only you, the guerrillas, can handle.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You want us to stop anyone from getting inside?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Amiya, you don't want me to go with you?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's safer for you to stay outside the control tower.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You don't want me to fight with you? We'll take on Talulah... together...!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis, Talulah's Arts are filled with energy. You're really good at dealing with all kinds of physical attacks that come your way, but... I'm worried about her flames...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... but she... she killed Ace... she killed so many people who mattered so much to me!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Why can't I go?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: If I'm not good at dealing with that... What should I do? What can I do? There were lots of other things I wasn't good at too!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You hate Talulah.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What else am I supposed to do?! Is it bad if I hate her?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't have the answers to those questions. I'm not saying you can't hate someone you've never met. I don't have that right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, Rosmontis... before I go, I'll leave you with an order.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: An order?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Orders have to be followed... Kal'tsit told me... elite operators follow orders. I...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: —Logos told me before we left. Patriot rarely sees anyone as his nemesis...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He prefers calling people by symbols or any characteristics or equipment they have, and doesn't usually call by name or race.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But he called you a Feline just now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That might mean he approves of you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But he calls you that too. He called you a Cautus. And what is it about me he liked? Is it how scary I look to others? I don't want people to see me like that.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...But, you know how often we're called monsters? People have been calling Patriot a monster for many, many years.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's true that the Arts we possess are really scary.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But he thinks of us as people. He thinks of us... as humans.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not equals? We're both... scary... and things that other people hate.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No, that's not right. Just look at all the guerrilla fighters here. Then there's the Reunion fighters following the other leaders, and, of course, our own people.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Your good deeds earn their respect. On the other hand, bad deeds earn their hate and mistrust.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We are judged by our actions. Just like how our teammates look out for you, just like how the Shieldguards defend Patriot, and just like how we trust Dr. Kal'tsit's word without question.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rosmontis, here's my order for you: Live, and make sure as many survive this as possible.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And, in order to do that, don't come after me even if I don't make it myself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya! But... you're my friend! I couldn't let you... let you go in there all by yourself!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No means no! Rosmontis, I promise you this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I promise I will come back alive.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So that's why, no matter what anybody says, no matter what they say happened to me, we both need to do whatever it takes to fulfill our mission.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have to survive this. Both of us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And this order goes for everyone who's here right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You must live.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The whole point of the Chernobog rescue mission was to save lives.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The whole point of the Core City infiltration was to save lives too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't ever say things like, 'There are causes worth giving your life for.' Never say that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Life is precious, and more importantly, your life belongs to yourself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No one... absolutely no one can let their life go to waste for us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...There's no such thing as necessary sacrifices.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: To say otherwise is just wrong.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Guard!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Yeah, I'm listening, Amiya... Leader of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: This goes for Reunion too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Cautus!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Just leave this place to us. Feline, let's go! Let's give the little rabbit the battlefield she wants.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You have to do this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Okay. I will see this through.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Yeah, thanks.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya Squad, follow me!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everyone, we'll meet again! Alive!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Goodbye...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: We'll see you later!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Okay, let's do our job here.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Well then, the guerrillas will take care of this one.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: This place is a little too cozy to be our battlefield! Come! Let's turn these blocks into a warzone!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Rhodes Island, let's go!
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Go over this for me again, Superintendent Ch'en.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Am I not being clear enough?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, you're clear as day. So perfectly clear that I thought I misheard.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en, you should know this is outside your purview.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Laws are different from one country to another, but common sense applies everywhere.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What did the Royal Guard Academy teach you anyway? Did they ever tell you to keep your feet on the ground and not bite off more than you can chew?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I graduated long ago. Now, I'm a police officer serving Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'll repeat again, so listen up. 'My wish is to join the L.G.D., and from there, I'll join the Special Inspection Unit.'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I will protect this city, and I'll clean this place up. There won't be another incident like that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What incident?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Well, aren't you forgetful? Or are you just playing dumb on purpose?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Watch your mouth, Officer Ch'en.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: My apologies, Chief Wei.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sir, I am referring to the incident that took place roughly ten years ago when the city was infiltrated by foreign forces. Several Lungmen citizens were kidnapped, and they are yet to be found.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I will continue to push the city to investigate and locate the kidnapped citizens after my admission to the department.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ch'en... You have no idea what you are talking about.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Sir, I am perfectly aware of what I am talking about.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I won't argue. How about this, then? As soon as you don't think you can keep it up, just let me know.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Tell me, Superintendent Ch'en. How long do you want to be in the department?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I didn't give him an answer.
For all these years, I've always wondered... just how much longer can I do this? How much longer do I want to do this?
And it wasn't until now that I finally realized the answer isn't for me to decide.
The Chi Xiao has gotten pretty rusty in my hand lately. I wonder just when will I finally understand? Shadowless doesn't mean to chase after shadows or let go. Instead, it's to never look back.
'As sword ere shadow's trace, cast off as cast.'
